name: Strategies.group
body:
### Welcome to Strategies.Group
We are a collective of mindful individuals hoping to find a community of answers to life's questions.

### Preparing for the Singularity
We will use mathematics to explore aspects of religion and spirituality and attempt to prepare for the most drastic of transformations to the human condition.

### Extra-Rational
Science is great, but sometimes it is slow and boring. We want to bring the creative and exciting back into rational explanations and explore the boundaries between technology and humans or science and magic.

### Ronan Whitteker
for more information contact Ronan at ronan.whitteker@gmail.com

### See our other projects:
www.aftermath.co.nz
www.overcomplete.info
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
